short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connects Sugar CRM to card reader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension is for internal use for a single customer that needs to read information from  id card (like First name and Last name) and  fill it to their app they use for administration. Extension is calling local host on the computer to access card reader connected to it.
